root.name: VTK overlay tutorial
root.description: This plugin shows how to display different type of 3D overlay in the VTK canvas 3D.
root.author: tutorial - Fab and Stef
root.changelog:
- Version 1.0.2.0 Date 2014-05-16 11:31:11
Updated for VTK 6.

fixed random object selection.

Minor change so painter change at each instance (no more wrong random).
